channel.title: Ok, help me PL0X!
channel.description: I finished making a RSPS today, and I had 15 players online, I'm using Hybrid PVP3 source and client, but everyone lagged out, including me? Why was this, I even tried logging in my self, but for a while it said "error connecting to server", but then in about 2 mins it worked for me and everyone...? Why did this happen, if it's because the server is not stable enough, how can I make it stable?

item.title: Ok, help me PL0X!
item.dc:creator: @vV_Fant0m_Vv vV Fant0m Vv
item.description:
@vV_Fant0m_Vv wrote:

DannY Boii:

I finished making a RSPS today, and I had 15 players online, I’m using Hybrid PVP3 source and client, but everyone lagged out, including me? Why was this, I even tried logging in my self, but for a while it said “error connecting to server”, but then in about 2 mins it worked for me and everyone…? Why did this happen, if it’s because the server is not stable enough, how can I make it stable?

Seems to me like you’re internet connection went to shit, causing all your players to lag out including you. Once your internet access was available again, your computer reconnected to your internet, making the server also available.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok, help me PL0X!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:6, topic:449856”]If you want to make a webclient its easy.

1.Go to 000webhost.com

2.Sign Up

3.Create your website

  1. Go to Cpanel

  2. Go to file manager

  3. Go to the “public” folder

  4. Delete the files inside of it.

  5. Click Upload

  6. Upload your jar and your index.html

If you haven’t made an index.html make one on notepad save it as Index.html to your desktop and put this code into your Index.html:

[code]

YOURSERVER [/code]

Once you have done all of these steps just go onto your website and everything should work :)[/quote]
OH god, just use this, it explains everything more clearly, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,449295.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Ok, help me PL0X!
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

If you want to make a webclient its easy.

1.Go to 000webhost.com

2.Sign Up

3.Create your website

  1. Go to Cpanel

  2. Go to file manager

  3. Go to the “public” folder

  4. Delete the files inside of it.

  5. Click Upload

  6. Upload your jar and your index.html

If you haven’t made an index.html make one on notepad save it as Index.html to your desktop and put this code into your Index.html:

[code]

YOURSERVER [/code]

Once you have done all of these steps just go onto your website and everything should work

item.title: Ok, help me PL0X!
item.dc:creator: @DannY_Boii DannY Boii
item.description:
@DannY_Boii wrote:

K thanx, any other ideas? I’m hoping it’s not because Hybrid PVP is not stable…

Read full topic

item.title: Ok, help me PL0X!
item.dc:creator: @Turmoilz1337x Turmoilz1337x
item.description:
@Turmoilz1337x wrote:

You could have possibly overloaded your RAM? How much RAM does your computer have? I figure that 15 players = 2GB of RAM in use? If you’re hosting on your computer, you may have had other programs running clogging your RAM. Just my guess, this is not definatly true.

Read full topic
